Method Detail

handle

void handle(int id,
            boolean add,
            long[] hashes)
Handles a cache update packet from the client

Parameters:
id - the entity id of the player
add - true if the hashes are to be added to the pool
hashesh - array of hashes to be added/removed from the hash pool

refreshChunkRequest

void refreshChunkRequest(int id,
                         int cx,
                         int cz)
Requests that a chunk is refreshed

Parameters:
id - the player's id
cx - the chunk X coord
cz - the chunk Y coord
